name: Ext_R5_Contract_te_ac_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Contract.term.action.reason for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Contract.term.action.reason from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Contract|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: Rationale for the action to be performed or not performed. Describes why the action is permitted or prohibited. Either a coded concept, or another resource whose existence justifies permitting or not permitting this action.
element.comment: `Contract.term.action.reason` maps to R4B `Contract.term.action.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Rationale for the action to be performed or not performed. Describes why the action is permitted or prohibited. Either a coded concept, or another resource whose existence justifies permitting or not permitting this action.
element.comment: `Contract.term.action.reason` maps to R4B `Contract.term.action.reason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Detailed codes for the contract action reason.
